# Developer

- [devdocs.io](https://devdocs.io/) - Searchable documentations
- [ss64](https://ss64.com/) - CLI reference guide
- [ReadTheDocs](https://readthedocs.org/) - Create, host, and browse documentation
- [execsql](http://execsql.osdn.io/) - Run SQL with metacommands
- [Bootstrap](https://getbootstrap.com/docs/4.5/getting-started/introduction/) - Web framework
- [pgAdmin](https://www.pgadmin.org/try/) - PostgreSQL sandbox 
- [Google Colab](https://colab.research.google.com/notebooks/intro.ipynb) - Collaborative Python notebooks
- [JavaScript]() - Guide 
- [swirl]() - Learn R, in R 
- [geojson.io]() - Create, view, and share maps 
- [repl.it]() - Collaborative in-browser IDE. 50+ languages 
- [Dev Tools]() - Collection of tools for developers
- [Integromat]() - Online scenario automation
- [PostgreSQL cheatsheet](https://karloespiritu.github.io/cheatsheets/postgresql/) - PostgreSQL cheatsheet
- [python-utils](https://www.python-utils.com/) - Playground for Python utilities
- [Spektran](https://spektran.com/) - Collection of useful color tools
- [Observable](https://observablehq.com/) - JavaScript notebooks
- [HTML Dog](https://www.htmldog.com/) - HTML tutorials
